text: Bilin may refer to: *Bilin, Mon State, a town in Mon State in Myanmar *Bilin Township, whose seat is Bilin, Mon State *Bilin (biochemistry), a type of biological pigment with a tetrapyrrole structure, for example found in bile *Bil'in, a Palestinian village in the West Bank *Bilin or Belin (river), a river in Tuva, Russia *The Bilen people, an ethnic group which mainly inhabits Eritrea and speaks the Blin language *The German name for the Czech town of Bílina
title: Bilin
